description.raw:
I noticed some divergence of our cmake code on our various projects, and did a meld of ign-transport and sdformat and have found these improvements from ign-transport to port here:

* port fix to uninstall script for paths with spaces

* mark SSE cmake variables as advanced

* Check if compiler flags are valid instead of checking if Clang is in use

* add a space to string when comparing compiler names

* whitespace

* re-arrange some cmake code to match ign-transport and fix whitespace

* unfilter an extra flag on windows, fix logic for calling sdf_setup_apple() cmake logic

* remove duplicate cmake code

* set CXX flags not only on UNIX

similar to an ign-transport pull request:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/213/port-cmake-fixes-from-sdformat/diff
